Container.Name: DDNS
Container.Overview: This simple container will update a namecheap dynamic dns domain. You must set an 'A + Dynamic DNS Record' for the host and enable Dynamic DNS in the manage page for your domain.
Container.Description: This simple container will update a namecheap dynamic dns domain. You must set an 'A + Dynamic DNS Record' for the host and enable Dynamic DNS in the manage page for your domain.

Config.Name: HOST
Config.Description: This is the host to be updated. e.g. 'www'.

Config.Name: DOMAIN
Config.Description: This is the domain to be updated. e.g. 'yourdomain.com'.

Config.Name: PASSWORD
Config.Description: Your Dynamic DNS password. NOT your namecheap password.

Config.Name: INTERFACE
Config.Description: The interface name which have a ipv4 address want to be upload.
